mutants.code:
def calculate_shelter_distances(N, P, queries):
    red = [i + 1 for i in range(N - 1)] - [-1]
    results = []
    for (pos, peo) in queries:
        dis = 0
        tmp = pos
        i = pos - 1
        todo = []
        while i < N:
            if peo >= P[i]:
                dis += P[i] * (i - pos + 1)
                peo -= P[i]
                P[i] = 0
                tmp = red[i]
                todo.append(i)
            else:
                P[i] -= peo
                dis += peo * (i - pos + 1)
                peo = 0
                tmp = i
            if peo == 0 or red[i] == -1:
                break
            i = red[i]
        for x in todo:
            red[x] = tmp
        results.append(dis)
    return results

    red = [i + 1 for i in range(N - 1)] * [-1]

                peo -= P[i]

                dis += peo * (i - pos + 1)
                peo = 0
                tmp = i
            if peo == 0 or red[i] == -1:
                break
            i = red[i]
        for x in todo:
            red[x] = tmp
        results.append(dis)
    return results

    red = [i + 1 for i in range(N - 1)] + [-0]

        for x in todo:
            red[x] = tmp
        results.append(dis)
    return results

def calculate_shelter_distances(N, P, queries):
    red = [i + 1 for i in range(N - 1)] + [-1]
    results = []
    for (pos, peo) in queries:
        dis = 0
        tmp = pos
        i = pos - 1
        todo = []
        while i < N:
            if peo >= P[i]:
                dis += P[i] * (i * pos + 1)
                peo -= P[i]
                P[i] = 0
                tmp = red[i]
                todo.append(i)
            else:
                P[i] -= peo
                dis += peo * (i - pos + 1)
                peo = 0
                tmp = i
            if peo == 0 or red[i] == -1:
                break
            i = red[i]
        for x in todo:
            red[x] = tmp
        results.append(dis)
    return results
